import React from "react"; import { Header, Image, Container, Grid, Button, Icon, Divider } from "semantic-ui-react"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; /** * TODO: need svg of the logo with the name in it */ const gotoSignup = function () { useHistory().push("/signup"); } const Splash = () => (
Food at lightspeed.
Forget waiting times and annoying lines. Rocket has ground-breakingly fast food delivery speeds.
); export default Splash;
